name: Technogics
tag_list: web-design, web-development, graphic-design, apps-development, software-development, open-source-development
overview: Technogics is a leading global consulting, IT services and business technology company, providing offshore software services, web application development, technical resource outsourcing at affordable costs than ever. We serve from strategy consulting to software solutions and implementing project development plans for our customers. Having excellent domain competencies in verticals such as Automotive, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Telecom-Infrastructure-Media-Entertainment and E-Governance makes us a leader in market. We offers a range of expertise aimed at helping customers re-engineer and re-invent their businesses to compete successfully in an ever-changing marketplace.
